public class Trie {
  private TrieNode root = new TrieNode('/'); // å­˜å‚¨æ— æ„ä¹‰å­—ç¬¦

  // å¾€Trieæ ‘ä¸­æ’å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  public void insert(char[] text) {

      if (p.children[index] == null) {
        TrieNode newNode = new TrieNode(text[i]);
        p.children[index] = newNode;
      }
      p = p.children[index];
    }
    p.isEndingChar = true;
  }

  // åœ¨Trieæ ‘ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  public boolean find(char[] pattern) {

      if (p.children[index] == null) {
        return false; // ä¸å­˜åœ¨pattern
      }
      p = p.children[index];

    else return true; // æ‰¾åˆ°pattern
  }

  }
}

Trieçš„è¿™ä¸ªç‰¹ç‚¹å¯ä»¥æ‰©å±•åˆ°æ›´åŠ å¹¿æ³›çš„ä¸€ä¸ªåº”ç”¨ä¸Šï¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è¾“å…¥è¡¥å…¨ã€‚

C ç‰ˆæœ¬ä»£ç ï¼š

#define OK 1
#define ERROR 0
#define TRUE 1
#define FALSE 0

typedef int Status;

typedef struct Node {
char data;
struct Node *children[26];
Status end;
} Trie, *TriePtr;

void Init(TriePtr *T)
{
(*T) = (TriePtr)malloc(sizeof(Trie));
(*T)->data = '/';
(*T)->end = FALSE;
}

void Insert(TriePtr T, char *str) {

int index;
char c;

while(c = *str++)
{
index = c - 'a';
if (T->children[index] == NULL)
{
TriePtr Node;
Node = (TriePtr)malloc(sizeof(Trie));
Node->data = c;
Node->end = FALSE;
T->children[index] = Node;
}

T = T->children[index];
}

T->end = TRUE;
}


Status Search(TriePtr T, char *str) {

int index;
char c;

while(c = *str++)
{
index = c - 'a';
if (T->children[index] == NULL)
{
return FALSE;
}

T = T->children[index];
}

if (T->end) {
return TRUE;
} else {
return FALSE;
}
}

public List<String> prefix(final String term) {
TreeNode p = root;
String prefix = "";
for (int i = 0; i < term.length(); i++) {
char ch = term.charAt(i);
int index = ch - 'a';
if (p.children[index] == null) {
break;
}
p = p.children[index];
prefix = prefix + p.data;
}

List<String> suffixList = recursiveSuffix(p);
final String prfx = prefix;
List<String> prefixList = suffixList.stream().map(k -> {return prfx +k;})
.collect(Collectors.toList());

return prefixList;
}

private List<String> recursiveSuffix(TreeNode treeNode) {
List<String> list = new ArrayList<>();
for (TreeNode child : treeNode.children) {
if (child == null) {
continue;
}

String suffix = String.valueOf(child.data);
for (String item : recursiveSuffix(child)) {
suffix = suffix + item;
}

list.add(suffix);
}

return list;
}

public Set<String> prefix(CharSequence prefix) {
TrieNode p = root;
for (int i = 0; i < prefix.length(); i++) {
char c = prefix.charAt(i);
if (p.child[c - 'a'] == null) return Collections.emptySet();
p = p.child[c - 'a'];
}

HashSet<String> suffixSet = new HashSet<>();
for (TrieNode tn : p.child) {
if (tn == null) continue;
Set<String> sub = recurSuffix(tn);
sub.forEach(s -> suffixSet.add(prefix + s));
}

// å®Œå…¨åŒ¹é…æ—¶è‡ªèº«ä¹Ÿæ˜¯
if (p.isEndingChar) suffixSet.add(prefix.toString());

return suffixSet;
}

private Set<String> recurSuffix(TrieNode tn) {
HashSet<String> suffixSet = new HashSet<>();
// å¦‚æœè‡ªå·±æ˜¯æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ™æŠŠè‡ªå·±åŠ è¿›å»
if (tn.isEndingChar) suffixSet.add(String.valueOf(tn.data));

for (TrieNode sub : tn.child) {
if (sub == null) continue;
// è·å–åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åç¼€
Set<String> subSuffix = recurSuffix(sub);
// åœ¨åç¼€å‰æ‹¼ä¸Šè‡ªå·±çš„
for (String suffix : subSuffix) {
suffixSet.add(tn.data + suffix);
}
}

return suffixSet;
}

public class Trie {
private TrieNode root = new TrieNode('/');

public void insert(char[] text) {
TrieNode p = root;
for(int i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {
int index = text[i] - 'a' < 0 ? index = text[i] - 'A' : text[i] - 'a';
if (p.children[index] == null) {
TrieNode newNode = new TrieNode(text[i]);
p.children[index] = newNode;
}
p = p.children[index];
}
p.isEndingChar = true;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
Trie trie = new Trie();
String test = "Iloveyou";
trie.insert(test.toCharArray());
System.out.println(trie.find(test.toCharArray()));
}


public boolean find(char[] pattern) {
TrieNode p = root;
for (int i = 0; i < pattern.length; ++i) {
int index = pattern[i] - 'a' < 0 ? index = pattern[i] - 'A' : pattern[i] - 'a';
if (p.children[index] == null) {
return false;
}
p = p.children[index];
}
if (p.isEndingChar == false) return false;
else return true;
}


class TrieNode{
public char data;
public TrieNode[] children = new TrieNode[26];
public boolean isEndingChar = false;
public TrieNode(char data){
this.data = data;
}
